entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023
